name: Prasanta Bhattacharjee
bio: I’m a passionate developer focused on building modern, scalable, and elegant full-stack applications.

about.heading: Turning Ideas Into Reality
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer who loves creating user-focused digital experiences. I combine design thinking and code craftsmanship to bring interactive products to life.

services.title: Web Design
services.desc: Creating visually engaging, modern, and responsive interfaces that balance aesthetics with usability.

services.title: Web Development
services.desc: Building scalable, high-performance web applications using React, Flask, Laravel, and MongoDB.

services.title: Research & Development
services.desc: Exploring new technologies, optimizing performance, and integrating AI-driven innovations to solve real-world challenges.

services.title: UI/UX Optimization
services.desc: Enhancing user experience through data-driven design, testing, and continuous improvement.

experience.company: Department of Computer Science & Mathematics, University of Lethbridge
descriptions: Evaluated and graded assignments with consistency and accuracy.
Collaborated with professors to align with course objectives and standards.
Provided feedback and guidance to students on coursework.
Clarified complex concepts to support student learning.
Assisted in maintaining academic integrity and grading fairness.
Developed and maintained a large-scale job portal platform to improve performance and user experience.
Built scalable Android application APIs and PHP-based systems with REST API integration.
Led a developer team by assigning tasks, reviewing code, and ensuring timely sprint delivery.
Optimized search algorithms and database queries to improve speed and accuracy.
Improved security by stabilizing legacy code and upgrading authentication with bcrypt and CSRF protection.
Developed and led task management and POS systems with a developer team.
Designed and optimized databases to support inventory, reporting, and user management.
Resolved performance issues, improving system speed, reliability, and user satisfaction.
Built advanced POS features for inventory forecasting and financial management.
Streamlined legacy systems with Composer migration, query optimization, and CSV import automation.

description: Conducted advanced research in Ensemble Deep Learning Models for Emergency Service Prioritization, applying DBSCAN and K-Means clustering on spatial and non-spatial data streams.
Developed real-time AI pipelines integrating time series modeling, data stream classification, and spatial analytics to predict severe weather emergency response priorities.

Published research paper “A Spatial Data Stream Ensemble for Prediction of Emergency Service Priorities” and received Best Paper Award at the 28th International Conference on Network-Based Information Systems (NBiS-2025).
Applied tools and frameworks including Python, PyTorch, Flask, Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn for model development and deployment.
Strengthened expertise in Machine Learning, AI, Deep Neural Network, Big Data, and Predictive Analytics while mentoring undergraduate students as a Graduate Teaching Assistant.
Focused on Software Development, Algorithms, and System Architecture, laying the foundation for full-stack engineering expertise.
Designed and developed academic projects using PHP, MySQL, CodeIgniter, and Bootstrap, focusing on performance optimization and secure backend architecture.
Built and deployed final-year project modules integrating user management, reporting, and database-driven dashboards.
Completed coursework in Data Structures, Operating Systems, Database Management Systems, Object-Oriented Programming, and Web Application Development.

projects.title: AI Job Tracker
projects.description: An AI-powered platform that analyzes job postings and matches them with uploaded CVs using NLP and OpenAI models.

caseStudy.overview: This project automates job search efficiency by using AI to evaluate resume-job compatibility in real-time. Built to save recruiters and job seekers time.

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: Full-stack task management system with authentication and REST APIs.
